lcInstruction.p: You can reuse a topic in multiple maps
You can reuse a map in multiple ways (for example, publishing it as a standalone deliverable or including it in other maps

Be careful about who edits your reusable topics or maps. Make sure that no one adds phrases such as "in the previous chapter" to your topics, or writes content that depends on the other topics in one of the maps where the reused topic is referenced. Remember that a change in a reused topic will be reflected everywhere that topic is referenced. The same applies to reused maps.
